properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 2:45PM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
At 244 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along
a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Grove to near South West
City. Movement was northeast at 30 mph.

Nickel size hail and wind gusts up to 50 mph will be possible with
these storms.

Strong thunderstorms will be near...
Noel around 315 PM CST.
Neosho, Pineville, Anderson, Goodman and Lanagan around 330 PM
CST.

Other locations impacted by these storms include Tiff City, Big Sugar
Creek State Park, Dodge and Cayuga.

This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 20.
properties.instruction:
These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio
stations and available television stations for additional information
and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms, and may lead
to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded
roadways.

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR SOUTHWESTERN NEWTON AND MCDONALD COUNTIES UNTIL 330 PM CST
